titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the exclusion from gross income of discharges of qualified principal residence indebtedness.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/30/2015--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exclusion from gross income of income attributable to the discharge of indebtedness on a principal residence.
